creditline: Gift of Gabriel P. and Yvonne M.L. Weisberg
markings: Paper label on verso: 56 La Toilette du matin. Pastel
medium: Pastel on tan paper, laid down on board
provenance: [Marcel Lecomte, Paris, until mid-1970s; to Weisberg]; Yvonne and Gabriel Weisberg, Minneapolis
signed: Lower right in blue pastel: H.G. Ibels
text: Best known for his posters, caricatures, and satires, Henri Gabriel Ibels also made designs for theater and, particularly relevant to this drawing, sheet music. The pastel could relate to his sheet music cover for The Song of the Spinning Wheel (La Chanson du Rouet). The lyrics give voice to a woman considering her future as a mother, but were written to be performed by a man—almost certainly in a tone of mockery. The song was published in 1892, thus suggesting an approximate date for the pastel.
title: Mother and Child
